description.narrative: The project will include (i) a 40 long kilometer 400kV double circuit transmission line from the Bangladesh India border to Bheramara, (ii) a 500mW back to back HVDC station at Bheramara; and (iii) a 230kV interconnection with the western grid of Bangladesh.

description.narrative: Successful development and operation of a transmission link between Bangladesh and India.

500MW of power (1,152-3,456 GWh)available over the interconnection to Bangladesh commencing 2012

description.narrative: Successful development and operation of a transmission link between Bangladesh and India.
